biotools.summary: BAREB, a BAyesian REpulsive Biclustering model, that can simultaneously cluster the Periodontal diseases (PD) patients and their tooth sites after taking the patient- and site-level covariates into consideration. BAREB uses the determinantal point process (DPP) prior to induce diversity among different biclusters to facilitate parsimony and interpretability.
